entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add IsEnumerated property to IEnumerable<T> interface #80144
  • ConfigurationBinderBenchmarks.Get benchmark failing in "Performance Linux x64 release mono Interpreter micro_mono perftiger NoJS False net8.0" #80141
  • CoreCLR JIT-generated code does not respect the Win x64 calling convention for the Memcpy/Memset helper calls #80140
  • Concurrent struct marshaling can lead to use-after-free crashes due to pGeneratedNewStub determination in CreateInteropILStub #80127
    8.0.0
  • [TestFailure] HttpClientHandlerTest.Http3 - quic.aiortc.org unreachable #80125
    8.0.0
  • Consider mapping more regex sets to AnyClass #80123
    Future
  • "Cross Platform Cryptography" article is out of date #80122
  • Unobserved Task Exception after closing ClientWebSocket #80116
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 50 Regressions on 12/28/2022 6:20:56 PM #80129
  • Getting Java.IO.FileNotFoundException on calling httpClient.PostAsync in MAUI app - Android #80139
  • System.Text.Json IgnoreReadOnlyProperties not working for enumerables #80113
  • System.Net.Quic is leaking UnobservedTaskExceptions #80111
    8.0.0
  • Wrong crossgen2 binary in artifacts/tests #80110
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetGeneration_fail/GetGeneration_fail.sh #80109

Closed

  • Test failure: Interop/ObjectiveC/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI.sh #79664
    8.0.0
  • Invoking GetSemanticModel causes a signal 11 code 1 crash on Android .NET 7.0.1 #80146
  • LibraryImport with custom StringMarshalling type causes the source generator to keep the Compilation object alive #78242
    8.0.0
  • Causing diffrent memory layout in .NET 6 and .NET 7 when field member has LayoutKind.Auto #80077
  • Hosting DirectSettingsOverrideConfigurationSetting and ConfigurationSettingCanInfluenceEnvironment test failures in CI #79453
    8.0.0
  • Consider updating 'BenchmarksGame' benchmarks to use HWIntrinsics #31292
    Future
  • Add ref T overloads for hardware intrinsic functions which takes T* #36182
    Future
  • AVX-512 support in System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 #35773
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Adding and subtracting floats with vectors #79960
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Decimal` constants #80042
  • Regressions in System.Memory.ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfString #80131
  • Two dimensional array with function pointers in .NET Framework (debug) #80112
  • Deadlock when enumerating resources with ResourceManager #74868
    8.0.0
  • System.Resources.ResourceManager is not thread safe when ignore case is enabled #74052
    Future
  • EnvironmentVariable operations with EnvironmentVariableTarget.User fails on Windows Nano Server #30566
    Future
  • HttpClient The response ended prematurely #72177
    8.0.0
  • Replace `Unsafe.NullRef<T>()` usage #80107
  • Inconsistent Uri c'tor implementation for Windows and Linux #80118
    8.0.0
  • InternalException at SslStream at DuplexPipeStreamAdapter DisposeAsync #66188
    8.0.0
  • Disabling test on Linux Bionic is not effective with `PlatformSpecific` #72369
    8.0.0
  • Docker .NET7.0 publish PublishAot fail with no gcc #80108
  • IL instruction: ldtoken(method) compiles incorrectly at PublishAOT. #78955
  • Exception in Socket.~Socket #1218
    Future
  • ILGenerator.Emit produces Method not found #76082
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #80153
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #80152
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve emitter output for IG creation/saving and other improvements #80151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #80150
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, 7.0.x
  • Enable new analyzers CA1510/11/12/13 and CA1856/57/58 #80149
    area-Meta
  • Ensure that we don't root the compilation when using a custom exception marshalling type. #80147
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add ConditionalSelect SIMD intrinsics #80145
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid generating unnecessary debug info #80143
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable regex generator nullable reference types validation #80142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use lower size optimization for tests #80137
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP][mono][interp] Add a bitset with IL jump targets #80136
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • SimdAsHWIntrinsic improvements and cleanup #80134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Fix pGeneratedNewStub determination #80128
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete erroneous simplifer annotation for regex fixer #80126
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80121
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80120
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Fix bunch of incompatibilies of ComWrappers #80119
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove page map from PAL virtual memory allocator #80105
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Revert back to using latest stable versions of chrome for testing #80135
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable inlining for helper method #80124
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.0
  • Generate CodeView debug information for .asm files #77084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add WidenUpper and WidenLower SIMD intrins #80117
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Hosting DirectSettingsOverrideConfigurationSetting and ConfigurationSettingCanInfluenceEnvironment test failures in CI #79455
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • SuperPMI: Be more flexible in finding coredistools #80054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include zero-sized diffs in the set of textual diffs generated #79917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore SendMessageTimeout failures on Windows Nano Server #80099
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • fix (doc) : Specify where `*.dgml` files are generated #80115
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Expand compare + brfalse/brtrue with single conditional branch opcode #80046
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Generate fewer `ExactMethodInstantiationsHashtable` entries #80090
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ignore uninstantiated generic method #80096
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] AOT BCL tests using -O1 to avoid OOM errors on CI. #80103
  • Fix HTTP/2 extended connect hang #80066
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/7.0] Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79866
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use function pointers instead of marshalled delegates in EventSource #79970
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm] enable JITs for interp->aot and aot->interp transitions #78493
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Enable CoreCLR init failure logging in single exe host #80104
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Rewrite how Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 are implemented #80091
    area-System.Numerics
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Prevent warning for implicit ILCompiler reference #79870
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove the TypeKey concept as the primary user for the concept is unable to use it effectively. #79418
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Fix crash in fixer on certain invalid patterns #80007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79994
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 7.0.x
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Avoid emitting gshared methods multiple times when prefer… #80100
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79862
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Reduce redundant moves with calls #79905
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support deleting "entire" stores in the VN-based dead store removal phase #79505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 6.0.x
  • Add more precise tracking of static bases #80093
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03

Created

PullRequests

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unable to compile .net 6.0 projects in VS 2022 #29713
  • [NetSDKE2E][Regression] With 3.1.424 SDK, building a project with multi referring classlib failed with error MSB1025 on Mac/Linux #28190

Updated

  • `dotnet publish` shows garbled characters when running on PMC on OS with Traditional Chinese language #29151
    Backlog
  • Provide a map file generation to use for remove unused references functionality #10414
    Backlog
  • Dotnet test in multiplatform docker build #29308
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With .Net 8 SDK installed in Chinese OS, the texts should not contain “Core” string when building the project. #29615
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.10) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29082
  • NETCOREAPP2_0_OR_GREATER not defined when net5-windows + UseWindowsForms #29718
  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app #29571
  • .Net 7 preview 7 is broken on linux arm64 via QEMU #27190
  • Updating from 7.0.100 to 7.0.101 crashes msbuild on mac #29596
  • Telemetry check causes crash when hidepid=2 is enabled #4270
  • GenerateDepsFile: The process cannot access the file '...\MyProject.deps.json' because it is being used by another process. #2902

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.103 #29723
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.406 #29722
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.309 #29721
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.114 #29720
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix the floating issue with tests run in VerifySettingFixture..ctor #29717
  • cover template samples with tests + fix floating issue with test run #29716
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Unskip `Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works` #29640
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [release/7.0.2xx] Revert hot reload script injection response buffering #29152
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Servicing-consider, Area-DotNet Test
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2077777 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot rename a class that contains a GeneratedRegex method #66208
  • COM library is causing a CS0246 Error in VS 2022 #66200
  • intellisense creating double namespace #66199
    Backlog

Closed

  • Roslyn unable to evaluate local variables on Windows Forms #66109
    17.5
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33303.166 #66210
  • SyntaxGenerator: Consider filtering `async` modifier for methods without a body #66173
  • 'non-nullable field is uninitialized' inspection for backing field of required property #66055
    17.5
  • `DeclarationModifiers.From` doesn't return `readonly` for methods #66170
  • The `DeclarationModifiers` class does not properly handle `readonly` keyword for `struct` \s #65834
  • CS8600 with MemberNotNullWhen in a property and using an implicit operator. #66160
  • CS1998 proposed fix "remove async modifier" produces non-compiling code when returned type differs from the return Task's type parameter #65536
  • Ref Struct Uncertain complain: CS8347 Cannot use a result of .... in this context because it may expose variables referenced by parameter 'source' outside of their declaration scope #66191
    17.5
  • "Generate property" codefix produces non-compiling code #66192

PullRequests

Created

  • Integration tests - Move extract method to new integration tests #66212
    Area-IDE
  • Remove usage of Workspace.Options from AutomationObject #66211
    Area-IDE
  • Allow rename on items also defined in SG #66209
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "OptionKey clean-up and integration tests" #66207
    Area-IDE
  • Framework compilers package for SDK consumption #66206
    Area-Compilers
  • If you see parentheses simplify them #66203
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adjust assert to account for error scenarios #66202
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Prefer default over starred item #66159
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow missing document in method debug info #66183
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Keep using statement in extract method #66168
    Next
  • Prevent stackoverflow in Json parsing #66205
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests for extract on keyword #66163
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adding ability to filter async modifiers for methods without a body in SyntaxGenerator #66201
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66204
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix Enums not appearing in AIOSP #66198
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adding ability for DeclarationModifiers class to support readonly structs and methods #66169
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66154
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash in find-refs with method with multiple declarations in different files #66197
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Qualify `Task.FromResult` when removing `async` modifier #66114
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65810
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next

Updated

  • Move VS specific option storage locations to VS layer #66042
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66213
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Skip implicit build optimization for false value of `OptimizeImplicitlyTriggeredBuild` #66182
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove DeclarationScope in favor of ScopedKind #66180
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix extraction inside anonymous function #66158
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Allow extract method in when statement #66165
    Area-IDE
  • inheritdoc order fixes #54494 #54618
    Area-IDE, Community
  • fix ignoring [MaybeNull] during type inference #66190
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't rely on unset values from BitVector in nullable state #66174
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove the Blazor survey link from the project templates #45854
  • WebEventData.ParseEventArgsJson has invalid UnconditionalSuppressMessage for JsonSerializer.Deserialize #45851
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #45848
  • Log message on logout success incorrectly states "Login completed successfully." (Blazor WASM) #45846
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • 3rd party notices link does not work #45745
    7.0.x
  • Skipped test WasmPublishIntegrationTest.Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works #39289
    8.0-MQ
  • Hg #45850
  • Transient local build failures: error MSB3491: Could not write lines to file #45596
  • custom elements doesn't work on any page except index.cshtml when hosting blazor components in razor pages #45818
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets` has a check for .NET6 so it fails on .NET7 #45849
  • Provide input arguments when calling OnParametersSet(Async) method #45516
    Discussions
  • Allow setting Content-Disposition to inline from Results.File and Results.Stream #45844
  • [docs] BuildFromSource.md - busted anchor link and incorrect step numbering #45839

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #45857
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #45856
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • Updated the Third Party Notices for 8.0 project templates #45853
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Backport deletion of playwright tests #45852
    6.0.x
  • Fix logout success log message (Blazor WebAssembly) #45847
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add Tags property to OutputCache property. #45843
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [AOT] Add RequiresDynamicCode annotation to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing #45580
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
    8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `516940f` to `71140c3` #45764
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Quarantine Settings_MaxHeaderListSize_Server #45812
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [docs] BuildFromSource.md fixes + edit pass #45828
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix gRPC template tests #45702
    area-mvc, area-grpc
  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45538
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm] unify startup bit more #45628
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 8.0
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Update Helix.Common.props #45772
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2078080 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix inconsistent casing of template parameters #45816
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border with URL source does not render correctly #12400
  • Border content clipping issue on iOS #12398
  • What's going on with the splash-screen? #12395
    Backlog
  • XAML-only ResourceDictionary not working when setting x:Class attribute #12390
    Backlog
  • `dotnet publish` fails for Windows [MSB4184] #12389
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Poor scroll performance in MAUI ListView #12388
    Backlog
  • MAUI blazor cannot inject `NavigationManager` into a service #12387
  • TabBar / Tab colours not working correctly on Windows #12386
    Backlog
  • How to make animation rate smooth #12385
    Backlog

Closed

  • Base64 string image source not working on iOS #12379
    Backlog
  • Fluent API support #12380
  • Support OSM by MAUI MapControl #12378
  • Issue with VisualStateManager on Windows Platform #12393

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update Essentials SecureStorage API Docs #12360
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Add more logging for BlazorWebView #12357
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to children #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 Planning
  • Toggle IsEnabled on Layout children when IsEnabled changes #12365
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Fix crash in SwipeView collapsing ListView groups #8651
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #11981
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix crash using complex html content #11409
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Don't watch for changes on an ImmutableBrush #12346
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Add a null-guard in MenuItem to prevent NRE #12207
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Give fallback width/height for Shapes prior to layout #12356
    area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiled model: Option to override entire folder contents #29971
  • Confusing exception messages when failing to obtain DbSet with shared-type entity types #29970
  • CollectionEntry created while materializing is stale if used later #29969
  • EF.CompileAsyncQuery with CancellationToken doesn't actually cancel query execution (SQL Server). #29968
  • Relational mapping hints are lost when applied to existing converter #29966
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Ordering with Multiple constructors in the Entity type #29940
  • SQLite: RETURNING clause doesn't work with AFTER triggers #29811
  • EF7 > Migrations are wrong when having the same property name in multiple child classes #29953
  • IsRowVersion or [Timestamp] on property that maps to provider byte[] type should generate rowversion column #12434
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #29973
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #29972
  • Fix relational mapping hints and add DbType #29967
  • Use raw string literals in scaffolding tests #29965
    auto-merge

Merged

  • SQLite: Simplify !Regex.IsMatch to NOT REGEXP #29781
    auto-merge
  • Long and ULong properties marked as rowversion automatically convert to binary on SQL Server #29961

Updated

  • Scaffold [ForeignKey] and [InverseProperty] when principal key is alternate key #29449
    blocked
  • Working implementation of precompiled queries #29949

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • When installing SDK 8.0, the installation wizard should say .NET 8.0 /dotnet8 #14952
  • [NETE2ESDK] Info for .NET 8.0 are not updated on .NET 8 SDK installation wizard #14996

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15186
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #15185
  • Update branding to 7.0.103 #15184
  • Update branding to 6.0.114 #15181

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.406 #15183
  • Update branding to 6.0.309 #15182
  • When overriding RID for non-Linux, use $(Platform) not x64 #15153

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #15145
  • Force /p:PortableBuild=true, for cases where we overrode the RID. #15163
  • #5412 updating svgs to use no cache #14904
  • Add Codespaces container definitions for the VMR #15172
